author: Paragon132
title: Probably the best of the first wave
review:
Since I usually buy legos on a whim, I saw this at wal-mart on clearance (which is kind of odd, but i didn't question it) and I'm overall very pleased with it.

Box/Instructions

Normal weird plastic bag, which is kind of started to grow on me, and regular instructions.

Parts

Normal HF ball and socket limbs, and a decent amount of red peices.

Minifigures

Two, if you count the jumper. Furno is slightly rare, I believe you can get him in the splitter beast set, and will be available again in the second wave.

The build

A rather interesting build. The designers made good use of the joints on the back to make the jetpack-light-arms thing, and I really like how they did that. So, a great build overall.

The completed model

An average sized mech, that looks really great.

Overall opinion

I would say, in my opinion, if you're going to get one set from the line, this is the set. This is probably the best set with a lot of playability and a great build and use of pieces.
